message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CANCEL_LAST_EVIDENCE_TREE
message.locale: A product delivery must have at least one evidence item associated with it.

message.name: ERR_CASESTATUS_XFV_DELAYED_PROCESS_PENDING
message.locale: Case status must not be 'Delayed Processing Pending'.

message.name: ERR_DAILY_RATE_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The daily rate must not be negative.
